definition: to fit/suitable/proper/just (now)/comfortable/well/to go/to follow or pursue
leisurely and free (idiom)/carefree and at ease
comfortable voice (well within one's range of pitch)

sentences.english: The Honolulu Blue Guest Room is a cozy cool escape from the summer sun.
sentences.chinese: 檀香山蓝色客房舒适凉爽，适合躲避夏日艳阳。

sentences.english: Slip-on construction with front and rear goring for a secure, comfortable fit.
sentences.chinese: 滑上建设一个安全，舒适合脚的前部和后部戈林。

sentences.english: Heat surroundings cosiness index is a important target of energy efficiency design in buildings.
sentences.chinese: 热环境舒适度指标是建筑节能设计的关键之一。

sentences.english: Wealth empowered him to live a comfortable life.
sentences.chinese: 财富使他能够过舒适的生活。

sentences.english: It has the biggest gap on the audience's satisfaction with comfort of spaces.
sentences.chinese: 观赏者对各设施空间舒适与气氛满意度之差异性较大。

sentences.english: Brand new wide sliding door leads you to the cozy back yard with pool and fruit trees.
sentences.chinese: 全新的大滑门带你到后院的舒适游泳池，还有果树。

sentences.english: The radiant ceiling cooling is a new technology with higher comfortable degree in the air-conditioning field.
sentences.chinese: 楼板辐射供冷是一种舒适度很高的新型空调技术。

sentences.english: Soft and cozy knit cotton hoodie.
We believe that urban infrastructure should be more comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 我们认为，城市基础设施建设应使人更加舒适。

sentences.english: The rear seats are extremely comfortable and the L-shaped headrests improve the driver's rear view visibility.
sentences.chinese: 后座非常舒适的L型头枕改善司机的后视能见度。

sentences.english: Taurus will show Capricorn how to enjoy a well-deserved break every so often and how to appreciate beauty and comfort.
sentences.chinese: 牛向魔证实要经常享受生活的片刻，享受美和舒适。

sentences.english: He has a comfortable apartment in a high-rise building in the business center of the city.
sentences.chinese: 他在市商业中心一幢高层建筑里有一套舒适的公寓。

sentences.english: The very source of our boredom also provides a solid foundation of unadulterated comfort.
sentences.chinese: 我们无聊的源头也提供了稳定的舒适感。

sentences.english: In Japan, the brand, Zojirushi, which represents comfort has been impressed on everyone.
sentences.chinese: 在日本，这个代表着舒适的象印商标已深入人心。

sentences.english: To make it more comfortable, a beaver carpets the floor with grass or shredded wood.
sentences.chinese: 为了使巢更舒适，河狸用草或碎木铺在地面。

sentences.english: Wear comfortable workout clothes and no shoes or socks.
sentences.chinese: 穿上舒适的健身服，不要穿鞋袜。

definition: leisure/relaxation/not working/idle/to enjoy leisure/to lie fallow
to live at home/to stay at home/home (schooling etc)/in-home (care etc)/household (repairs etc)/living (environment etc)
